name: tm68
effect: Teaches Giga Impact to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Giga Impact to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black_white: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.
